title: How to Access Office 365 Admin Center on PC or Mac

steps.title: Open the Microsoft Office website in your internet browser.
steps.content: Open the Microsoft Office website in your internet browser. Type www.office.com into your browser's address bar, and hit ↵ Enter or ⏎ Return on your keyboard.

steps.title: Click the Sign in button on the top-right.
steps.content: Click the Sign in button on the top-right. You can find this button in the upper-right corner of the page. It will open the login portal on a new page.

steps.title: Sign in to your Office 365 admin account.
steps.content: Sign in to your Office 365 admin account. You'll have to sign in with an account that has admin permissions in order to view the admin center. Enter your admin account's email address, phone number, or Skype name. Click Next . Enter your account password. Click Sign in .

steps.title: Click the icon on the top-left.
steps.content: Click the icon on the top-left. You can find this button in the upper-left corner of your screen. It will open the Apps menu.

steps.title: Click Admin on the Apps menu.
steps.content: Click Admin on the Apps menu. This will open the Office 365 admin center on the right-hand side. The Admin tile will appear only if you're signed into an account with admin permissions.
